title: Sofia Vergara Talks Wedding Plans With Mario Lopez
author: Fox News
description: The stunning Colombian chatted with Extra's Mario Lopez about her upcoming wedding plans.
cleaned_text: When Sofia Vergara's fiancé Nick Loeb proposed to the "Modern Family" star, we couldn't help but start to wonder what their wedding day might be like. The Colombian belleza chatted with Extra's Mario Lopez about her upcoming wedding plans. "I did such a big party for my 40th birthday, that now either I do something more or I do something even better than that," Vergara said.
